column4: How can i fix my mime types? Php files are inter-changed to html mime type and its really weird
if i make a php file with gedit and save it, it thinks its a html mime type
and highlights it as html. and naultilis browses the file as a html and wants to open it in firefox, which is wrong.
what do you want it to open with?....you can change that in nautilis
gedit, but everything thinks php files are html files even though it ends in .php
so if i change the "open with" settings in nautilis, it changes html settings
im just saying that you can change what app it opens with
click on it once.......then at the top bar...change the app
but thats a hack and im looking for a proper fix
oh....when i do that, it normaly becomes the default app for that file type......
same for me, but that changes html settings not php settings
i dont want to disturb html settings
oh..i see, i have no idea then.......i dont know php.....sorry
maybe it has something to do with the encoding?
it thinks they are html encoded but i donno how to make it php encoding :S
all i ever used for web design is adobe go-live, i may be able to figure it out there........but other than that.....idk
